name: Commoner

actions.name: Club
actions.description: Melee attack with a club.

description: Commoners include peasants, serfs, servants, pilgrims, merchants, artisans, and hermits.

traits.name: Training
traits.description: The commoner has proficiency in one skill of the DM's choice and has Advantage whenever it makes an ability check using that skill.

name: Bandit

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The bandit has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the bandit's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, range 80/320 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

description: Bandits rove in gangs and are sometimes led by thugs, veterans, or spellcasters. Not all bandits are combative; some are desperate commoners who resort to lawlessness out of necessity.

name: Cultist

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.description: The cultist has Advantage on saving throws against the Charmed and Frightened conditions.

actions.name: Ritual Sickle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing damage plus 1 Necrotic damage.

description: Cultists swear allegiance to dark powers such as elemental princes, demon lords, or archdevils.

name: Guard

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage.

description: Guards include city watch members, sentries, and bodyguards that protect a person or place.

name: Noble

actions.name: Rapier
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Nobles wield great authority and influence as members of the upper class, possessing wealth and connections that can make them as combative and dangerous as combatants.

name: Warrior Infantry

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The warrior has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage.

description: Warrior infantry are rank-and-file soldiers that make up the bulk of any organized army.

name: Priest Acolyte

actions.name: Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
**At Will:** *Light*, *Thaumaturgy*

description: Acolytes are junior members of the clergy, usually answerable to a priest. They perform a variety of functions in a temple and are granted minor spellcasting power by their deities.

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The priest casts *Bless*, *Healing Word*, or *Sanctuary*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Performer

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
traits.description: The performer targets one creature within 30 feet. If the target can hear the performer, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have Disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the performer's next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Inspire (2/Day)
bonusActions.description: The performer chooses one creature within 30 feet that can hear the performer. That creature gains a 1d6 Inspiration die it can add to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next 10 minutes.

description: Performers include bards, minstrels, actors, and other entertainers who use their talents to earn a living.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The performer is hit by an attack roll. *Response:* The performer halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.

name: Scout

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.description: The scout has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The scout makes two attacks, using Shortsword and Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

description: Scouts are skilled hunters and trackers who offer their services for a fee.

name: Tough

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, range 100/400 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Menace
bonusActions.description: The tough targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of the tough's next turn.

description: Toughs are upgraded enforcers who command fear through brute intimidation.

name: Pirate

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The pirate has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the pirate's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pirate makes two Dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Enthralling Panache.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Enthralling Panache
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the pirate can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

description: Pirates sail the seas in search of plunder. Some are little more than armed sailors, while others are ruthless reavers.

name: Spy

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.description: On each of its turns, the spy can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a Bonus Action.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.description: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that doesn't have the Incapacitated condition and the spy doesn't have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

description: Spies are skilled in deception and subterfuge. Many work as informants or intelligence agents.

bonusActions.name: Cunning Action
bonusActions.description: The spy takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

name: Bandit Captain

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bandit makes two attacks, using Scimitar and Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Bandit captains command gangs of bandits and often use them to prey on caravans, raid villages, or patrol for a thieves' guild.

name: Berserker

traits.name: Bloodied Frenzy
traits.description: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d12 + 3) Slashing damage.

description: Berserkers are ferocious warriors who throw themselves into battle with reckless abandon.

name: Cultist Fanatic

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.description: The fanatic has Advantage on saving throws against the Charmed and Frightened conditions.

actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Light*, *Thaumaturgy*
**2/Day:** *Command*
**1/Day:** *Hold Person*

description: Cult fanatics are zealous devotees who lead cult cells and preach the dark will of their masters.

bonusActions.name: Spiritual Weapon
bonusActions.description: The cultist casts the *Spiritual Weapon* spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Druid

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The druid makes two attacks, using Vine Staff or Verdant Wisp in any combination.

actions.name: Vine Staff
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Verdant Wisp
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 90 ft. *Hit:* 10 (3d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The druid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Druidcraft*, *Speak with Animals*
**2/Day Each:** *Entangle*, *Thunderwave*
**1/Day Each:** *Animal Messenger*, *Longstrider*, *Moonbeam*

description: Druids dwell in forests and other secluded wilderness locations, where they protect the natural world from monsters and the encroachment of civilization.

name: Mage Apprentice

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d10 + 3) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Mage Hand*, *Prestidigitation*
**1/Day Each:** *Disguise Self*, *Ice Knife*, *Mage Armor* (included in AC), *Thunderwave*

description: Mage apprentices are fledgling spellcasters learning the ways of arcane magic.

name: Priest

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The priest makes two attacks, using Mace or Radiant Flame in any combination.

actions.name: Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d10) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
**At Will:** *Light*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day:** *Spirit Guardians*

description: Priests bring the teachings of their gods to the common folk. They are the spiritual leaders of temples and shrines.

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The priest casts *Bless*, *Dispel Magic*, *Healing Word*, or *Lesser Restoration*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Knight

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: The knight has Advantage on saving throws against the Frightened condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The knight makes two attacks, using Greatsword or Heavy Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +2, range 100/400 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d10) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Radiant damage.

bonusActions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
bonusActions.description: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight has the Incapacitated condition or dies.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Knights are warriors who pledge service to rulers, religious orders, and noble causes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The scout makes two attacks, using Shortsword or Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Piercing damage if the attack was made with Advantage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Piercing damage if the attack was made with Advantage.

bonusActions.name: Aim
bonusActions.description: The scout has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The scout is hit by an attack roll. *Response:* The scout halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.

name: Warrior Veteran

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The warrior makes two Greatsword or Heavy Crossbow attacks.
multiattackActions: warrior makes two Greatsword or Heavy Crossbow

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, range 100/400 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

description: Veterans are professional soldiers who have seen numerous battles and emerged victorious.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The warrior is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. *Response:* The warrior adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

name: Guard Captain

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The guard makes two attacks, using Javelin or Longsword in any combination.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Slashing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The guard captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the guard captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Guard captains oversee the protection of a settlement, noble estate, or other location.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The tough makes two attacks, using Warhammer or Heavy Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the tough pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 100/400 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d10 + 2) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

name: Gladiator

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: The gladiator has Advantage on saving throws against the Frightened condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gladiator makes three Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Shield Bash.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature within 5 feet that the gladiator can see. *Failure:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Gladiators battle for the entertainment of raucous crowds. Some gladiators are combatants forced to fight to the death, while others are professional combatants.

name: Mage

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mage makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 16 (3d8 + 3) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Light*, *Mage Armor* (included in AC), *Mage Hand*, *Prestidigitation*
**2/Day Each:** *Fireball* (level 4 version), *Invisibility*
**1/Day Each:** *Cone of Cold*, *Fly*

description: Mages are accomplished spellcasters who study the arcane arts.

bonusActions.name: Misty Step
bonusActions.description: The mage casts *Misty Step*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

reactions.name: Protective Magic
reactions.description: The mage casts *Counterspell* or *Shield* in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The performer makes three Rapier attacks.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Beguiling Song
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet. *Failure:* 20 (3d10 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the end of the performer's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The performer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Minor Illusion*, *Prestidigitation*
**1/Day:** *Tasha's Hideous Laughter* (level 3 version)

name: Pirate Captain

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pirate makes three attacks, using Rapier or Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage, and the pirate has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The pirate is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. *Response:* The pirate adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the pirate makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

description: Pirate captains command crews of pirates and scallywags, plundering vessels and coastal settlements.

bonusActions.name: Captain's Charm
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 14, one creature the pirate can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bandit makes three Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Blinding Flash
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the bandit can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the bandit's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The bandit casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**At Will:** *Disguise Self*, *Mage Hand*, *Minor Illusion*
**1/Day Each:** *Hold Person* (level 4 version), *Mage Armor* (included in AC), *Major Image*

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cultist makes two Tentacle Lash attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Mind Rot.

actions.name: Tentacle Lash
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two tentacles, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Mind Rot
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature the cultist can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 27 (6d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the cultist's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Detect Thoughts*, *Minor Illusion*

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.description: The cultist casts *Counterspell* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Assassin

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.description: On each of its turns, the assassin can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a Bonus Action.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.description: The assassin deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that doesn't have the Incapacitated condition and the assassin doesn't have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The assassin makes three attacks, using Shortsword or Light Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the assassin's next turn.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, range 80/320 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) Poison damage.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.description: The assassin halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The assassin must be able to see the attacker.

description: Assassins are remorseless killers who work for money, revenge, or ideology.

bonusActions.name: Cunning Action
bonusActions.description: The assassin takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The berserker makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Javelin in any combination.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Thunder damage to the target or another creature within 5 feet of the target.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the berserker's next turn.

traits.name: Bloodied Frenzy
traits.description: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

bonusActions.name: Frenzied Rush
bonusActions.description: Each ally within 30 feet of the berserker can take a Reaction to move up to half the ally's Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The berserker can also move up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cultist makes three attacks, using Dread Scythe or Deathly Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Dread Scythe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain Hit Points until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Deathly Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d10) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**At Will:** *Speak with Dead*, *Thaumaturgy*

bonusActions.name: Spirit Wail
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the cultist. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Psychic damage, and the creature has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cultist makes three attacks, using Elemental Flail or Elemental Claw in any combination.

actions.name: Elemental Flail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 25 (6d6 + 4) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

actions.name: Elemental Claw
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d10) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the cultist moves the target up to 10 feet straight toward or away from itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Elementalism*, *Mage Hand*

reactions.name: Elemental Absorption
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The cultist takes Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage. *Response:* The cultist gives itself Resistance to that instance of damage and gains 10 Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cultist makes three Pact Axe attacks.

actions.name: Pact Axe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Scorching Ray* (level 5 version), *Thaumaturgy*
**2/Day:** *Fireball* (level 6 version)

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke
reactions.description: The cultist casts *Hellish Rebuke* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cultist makes three attacks, using Pact Blade or Radiant Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 31 (4d12 + 5) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Mage Armor* (included in AC), *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Jallarzi's Storm of Radiance* (level 7 version), *Mass Suggestion*

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The noble makes three Beguiling Strike attacks.

actions.name: Beguiling Strike
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 18 (4d6 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the noble's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The noble casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
**At Will:** *Mage Armor* (included in AC), *Mage Hand*, *Minor Illusion*
**1/Day Each:** *Befuddlement*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Fly*, *Scrying*, *Shatter* (level 7 version)

reactions.name: Shield
reactions.description: The noble casts *Shield* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The performer makes three Bejeweled Baton attacks.

actions.name: Bejeweled Baton
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d4 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Majestic Song
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet. *Failure:* 22 (4d8 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed or Frightened condition (performer's choice) until the end of the performer's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The performer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Mage Hand*, *Minor Illusion*, *Prestidigitation*
**1/Day Each:** *Major Image*, *Project Image*

reactions.name: Warding Charm
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature hits the performer with an attack roll. *Response -- Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 17, the triggering creature. *Failure:* The attack roll misses the performer, and the target has the Charmed condition until the end of the performer's next turn.

name: Spy Master

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.description: On each of its turns, the spy master can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a Bonus Action.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the spy master is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.description: The spy master deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy master that doesn't have the Incapacitated condition and the spy master doesn't have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The spy makes three attacks, using Rapier or Hand Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage.

actions.name: Smoke Bomb
actions.description: The spy throws a bomb to a point it can see within 30 feet of itself. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 16, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. *Failure:* 28 (8d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the end of the spy's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.description: The spy master halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The spy master must be able to see the attacker.

description: Spy masters are the heads of intelligence networks, skilled at manipulating others and extracting secrets.

bonusActions.name: Cunning Action
bonusActions.description: The spy takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The warrior makes three attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 19 (4d6 + 5) Slashing damage. The warrior also creates one of the following effects:

actions.name: Sap
actions.description: The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the warrior's next turn.

actions.name: Maneuver
actions.description: One ally who can see or hear the warrior can take a Reaction to move up to half the ally's Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d8 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the target's next turn.

bonusActions.name: Tactical Charge
bonusActions.description: The warrior moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

reactions.name: Counterattack
reactions.description: Trigger: The warrior is hit by an attack roll. Response: The warrior adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the warrior can make one Greatsword or Longbow attack against the attacker.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bandit makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the bandit is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the bandit instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

bonusActions.name: Deadly Aim
bonusActions.description: The bandit gives itself Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn. If that attack hits, the target takes an extra 28 (8d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The archmage makes four Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. or range 150 ft. *Hit:* 27 (4d10 + 5) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The archmage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Disguise Self*, *Invisibility*, *Light*, *Mage Armor* (included in AC), *Mage Hand*, *Prestidigitation*
**2/Day Each:** *Fly*, *Lightning Bolt* (level 7 version)
**1/Day Each:** *Cone of Cold* (level 9 version), *Mind Blank* (cast before combat), *Scrying*, *Teleport*

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The archmage has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Misty Step
bonusActions.description: The mage casts *Misty Step*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

reactions.name: Protective Magic
reactions.description: The archmage casts *Counterspell* or *Shield* in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The archpriest makes three Radiant Burst attacks.

actions.name: Radiant Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 27 (4d10 + 5) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Holy Word
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 17, each enemy in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the archpriest. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the archpriest's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The archpriest casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Light*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Flame Strike* (level 6 version), *Greater Restoration*, *Raise Dead*, *Zone of Truth*

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The priest casts *Bless*, *Dispel Magic*, *Healing Word*, or *Lesser Restoration*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pirate makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (3d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of the pirate's choice:

actions.name: Awestruck
actions.description: The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Rally
bonusActions.description: The pirate chooses up to three other creatures it can see within 30 feet. Until the start of the pirate's next turn, the targets have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

reactions.name: Defensive Stance
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The pirate is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. *Response:* The pirate adds 4 to its AC against melee attack rolls (including the triggering attack) until the start of its next turn, possibly causing the attacks to miss.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The knight makes three attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The knight casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
**1/Day Each:** *Daylight*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Greater Restoration*, *Phantom Steed*

traits.name: Aura of Bravery
traits.description: Creatures of the knight's choice in a 30-foot Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions while there.
